resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

VendorRef.name: VendorRef
VendorRef.description: The ID of the vendor who the bill is for. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
VendorRef.ai_hint: The ID of the vendor who the bill is for. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

Line.name: Line
Line.description: Individual line item of a transaction

options.name: Amount
options.description: Monetary amount of the line item

options.name: Description
options.description: Textual description of the line item

options.name: itemId
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: LineNum
options.description: Position of the line item relative to others

options.displayName: Tax Code Ref Name or ID
options.name: TaxCodeRef
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: Qty
options.description: Number of units of the line item

Line.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: Active
options.description: Whether the employee is currently enabled for use by QuickBooks

options.name: Balance
options.description: The balance reflecting any payments made against the transaction

options.name: PrintOnCheckName
options.description: Name of the vendor as printed on a check

options.name: Vendor1099
options.description: Whether the vendor is an independent contractor, given a 1099-MISC form at the end of the year

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

billId.name: billId
billId.description: The ID of the bill to update
billId.ai_hint: The ID of the bill to update

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: query
options.description: The condition for selecting vendors. See the guide for supported syntax.

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: Active
options.description: Whether the employee is currently enabled for use by QuickBooks

options.name: Balance
options.description: The balance reflecting any payments made against the transaction

options.name: PrintOnCheckName
options.description: Name of the vendor as printed on a check

options.name: Vendor1099
options.description: Whether the vendor is an independent contractor, given a 1099-MISC form at the end of the year

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

displayName.name: displayName
displayName.description: The display name of the vendor to create
displayName.ai_hint: The display name of the vendor to create

customerId.name: customerId
customerId.description: The ID of the customer to update
customerId.ai_hint: The ID of the customer to update

employeeId.name: employeeId
employeeId.description: The ID of the employee to update
employeeId.ai_hint: The ID of the employee to update

CustomerRef.name: CustomerRef
CustomerRef.description: The ID of the customer who the payment is for. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
CustomerRef.ai_hint: The ID of the customer who the payment is for. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

estimateId.name: estimateId
estimateId.description: The ID of the estimate to update
estimateId.ai_hint: The ID of the estimate to update

download.name: download
download.description: Whether to download estimate as PDF file

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: Name of the file that will be downloaded
fileName.ai_hint: Name of the file that will be downloaded

email.name: email
email.description: The email of the recipient of the payment
email.ai_hint: The email of the recipient of the payment

invoiceId.name: invoiceId
invoiceId.description: The ID of the invoice to update
invoiceId.ai_hint: The ID of the invoice to update

itemId.name: itemId
itemId.description: The ID of the item to retrieve
itemId.ai_hint: The ID of the item to retrieve

paymentId.name: paymentId
paymentId.description: The ID of the payment to update
paymentId.ai_hint: The ID of the payment to update

purchaseId.name: purchaseId
purchaseId.description: The ID of the purchase to retrieve
purchaseId.ai_hint: The ID of the purchase to retrieve

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

vendorId.name: vendorId
vendorId.description: The ID of the vendor to update
vendorId.ai_hint: The ID of the vendor to update

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'bill' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'bill' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'VendorRef'
IF resource == 'bill' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'Line'
IF resource == 'bill' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'bill' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'billId'
IF resource == 'bill' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'billId'
IF resource == 'bill' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'bill' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'bill' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'bill' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'billId'
IF resource == 'bill' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'customer' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'displayName'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'customerId'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'customerId'
IF resource == 'customer' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'employee' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'employee' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'FamilyName'
IF resource == 'employee' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'GivenName'
IF resource == 'employee' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'employee' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'employeeId'
IF resource == 'employee' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'employee' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'employee' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'employee' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'employeeId'
IF resource == 'employee' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'estimate' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'estimate' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'CustomerRef'
IF resource == 'estimate' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'Line'
IF resource == 'estimate' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'estimate' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'estimateId'
IF resource == 'estimate' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'estimateId'
IF resource == 'estimate' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'download'
IF resource == 'estimate' AND operation == 'get' AND download == True THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryProperty'
IF resource == 'estimate' AND operation == 'get' AND download == True THEN SHOW parameter 'fileName'
IF resource == 'estimate' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'estimate' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'estimate' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'estimate' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'estimateId'
IF resource == 'estimate' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'estimate' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'estimateId'
IF resource == 'estimate' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'invoice' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'CustomerRef'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'Line'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'invoiceId'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'invoiceId'

IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'get' AND download == True THEN SHOW parameter 'fileName'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'invoiceId'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'void' THEN SHOW parameter 'invoiceId'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'invoiceId'
IF resource == 'invoice' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'item' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'itemId'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'item' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'

IF resource == 'payment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'payment' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'payment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'payment' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'paymentId'
IF resource == 'payment' AND operation == 'send' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'

IF resource == 'purchase' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'transaction' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
